body:
Hello Boiz and Girls! 

Seeing that there has been lots of apology threads I thought it was time for mine. I know I have made a couple of these and then gone straight to dickhead mode again and got myself banned but lets hope I don't get 1 infraction. I will try making this without telling you my life story.

I am very sorry! When I was 11 I didn't care about rules. I thought that it was quite fun for me to do what I wanted. I was quite selfish and all so thats where I got bloody 15 infractions (Then got perm banned) I got that appealed and got more infractions because....


Idek why but yeah. I made an apology thread and everyone thought I changed but then I got banned again.



THEN.... I got appealed by amazing mod pel. You should of seen my reaction when I saw pel's message from support. I nearly cried of happiness. 1 month or so later I got an infraction from Iron for scamming (Forums). That was absolute crap that I got accused of something I didn't do . I was so mad I started getting bitchy at the mods and got ANOTHER infraction for "swearing". Lardi Lardi La. So on I got about 2 more infractions. Then steven banned me! Then I got unbanned 8 days later thanks to Colecrc!

Now look at me. I am popular on avicus for my shit singing on ts and my rules broken. I guess I have had a rolar coaster on avicus. I want to say sorry for my bitch attitude. I actually laugh at my VERY old forum posts and they are absolute crap with no grammar. so....


yeeee.... 

Sorry

yeeee.... 

Sorry
